item.title: Lisa add a quote by Edmund Wilson
item.description: "No two persons ever read the same book." -- Edmund Wilson

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Anton Chekhov
item.description: "Don't tell me the moon is shining; show me the glint of light on broken glass." -- Anton Chekhov

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Patricia H. Graham
item.description: "Never let it be said that dialect is a reflection of intellect. On the contrary, it is a reflection of the deep traditional values of a culture that respects family, God, and a language system above everything else. I give thanks to my maker that I’m a Southern woman." -- Patricia H. Graham

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Kristina McMorris
item.description: "It’s odd, isn’t it? People die every day and the world goes on like nothing happened. But when it’s a person you love, you think everyone should stop and take notice. That they ought to cry and light candles and tell you that you’re not alone." -- Kristina McMorris
